message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can do $10500, which is a bit higher than your offer but still a discount from my original price. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $9500. Would you be willing to meet me at $9500?

I understand you're really close to your target price, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $10200, which is a bit higher than your offer but still a good compromise. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my target price, but I'm still a bit away. Would you be willing to meet me at $9800?

I'm getting a bit concerned about the price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I can do $10000, which is my original price. I think this is a fair compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $9500. Would you be willing to meet me at $9500?
